Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Identify Nucleic Acid Targets In Respiratory Specimens From Microbial Agents That Cause The SARS-Cov-2 Respiratory Infection And Other Microbial Agents When In A Multi-Target Test
Multi-Target Respiratory Specimen Nucleic Acid Test Including Sars-Cov-2 And Other Microbial Agents
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BIOFIRE SPOTFIRE Respiratory Panel Mini, a multiplex PCR assay for qualitative detection of multiple respiratory viral nucleic acids using the BIOFIRE SPOTFIRE System.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative, simultaneous detection and identification of multiple respiratory viral nucleic acids in nasopharyngeal swab specimens from individuals with signs and symptoms of respiratory tract infection, including COVID-19.
